headline: What Berkshire Hathaway (BRK.A)'s Potential Kraft Heinz Exit Means For Shareholders
summary: Earlier in January 2026, Kraft Heinz disclosed in an SEC filing that Berkshire Hathaway, now led by CEO Greg Abel, may sell up to its entire 325,442,152-share stake, potentially ending a decade-long investment Warren Buffett helped create through the 2015 Kraft–Heinz merger. This possible full exit marks a rare reversal of a high-profile Buffett-era deal and offers an early signal of how Abel may reshape Berkshire’s portfolio and capital allocation priorities. We’ll now examine how this...

headline: Pour Yourself a Red One: Introducing the KegChup – the First Keg of Unmistakably Rich HEINZ Ketchup
summary: PITTSBURGH & CHICAGO, January 27, 2026--Just in time for the Big Game, HEINZ is cracking open a new way to enjoy America’s favorite condiment. Introducing the HEINZ KegChup – the first-ever keg of unmistakably rich HEINZ ketchup. Inspired by a solution the beer industry has tapped countless times to ensure fans never run dry, the HEINZ KegChup allows watch parties to never be short of the crowd-favorite condiment – because an empty ketchup bottle may be a bigger party foul than a dry keg.

content.title: Pour Yourself a Red One: Introducing the KegChup – the First Keg of Unmistakably Rich HEINZ Ketchup
content.summary: PITTSBURGH & CHICAGO, January 27, 2026--Just in time for the Big Game, HEINZ is cracking open a new way to enjoy America’s favorite condiment. Introducing the HEINZ KegChup – the first-ever keg of unmistakably rich HEINZ ketchup. Inspired by a solution the beer industry has tapped countless times to ensure fans never run dry, the HEINZ KegChup allows watch parties to never be short of the crowd-favorite condiment – because an empty ketchup bottle may be a bigger party foul than a dry keg.

thumbnail.caption: Ahead of football’s biggest game, HEINZ unveils the HEINZ KegChup, a 114 oz, stainless steel keg of thick, rich ketchup ensuring no watch party or snack spread is short on fans’ favorite condiment.
